About Me

Few things about me

BIO

After graduating with master's degree in French language and literature, I started to work as a French speaking QA Analyst which led me to open a new chapter in my professional career in the IT field. Through this position, as well as through my personal involvement, I’ve gained the necessary experience in software testing and in other related aspects of quality assurance.
Once I’ve established a solid base in QA field, I began acquiring technical skills mainly via courses organized by FTN Informatika, which allowed me to learn a great deal about back-end development in Java, front-end development in React and working with databases. More detailed curriculum vitae can be consulted here.

Work Experience

Synechron

QA Analyst

- Translating and analyzing business requirements
- Planning and coordinating testing activities during development process
- Defining, creating and executing test cases (functional, regression, smoke, e2e, exploratory etc.)
- Writing automated tests in Java using Selenium WebDriver and TestNG framework
- Writing API automated tests using Postman
- Identifying, reporting and analyzing issues

Brightmarbles

QA Engineer

- Participating in definition of business requirements
- Writing user stories based on existing requirements and UI designs
- Planning and coordinating testing activities during development process
- Defining, creating and executing test cases (functional, regression, smoke, e2e, exploratory etc.)
- Writing automated tests in JavaScript using Cypress
- Identifying, reporting and analyzing issues
